main.name: Manpreet Singh
main.description: I have specialized in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, Bootstrap, JQuery, PHP. I am developing websites optimized with clean code. As well as I know javascript framework React.js
main.bio: I am Manpreet, Web Developer, and passionate about Web Development. I have specialized in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, Bootstrap, JQuery, Github, PHP and SQL(MYSQL). I am developing websites optimized with clean code. I always try to learn something new. I am always with a cup of tea, fun with friends.I hardly believe the word Stay hungry, Stay Foolish.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Manpreet Singh must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have 2.1 years on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
